page.title: 14SHOPS
page.content: In{Hainford}there is only one shop. There are about one hundred customers a day.It was built as a shop many years ago. We interveiwed three people. They all use the shop twice a week.They all use the shop for things they have forgotten in Norwich. In{Spixworth}there are seven shops.The butchers and the fruit shop are one hundred years old.The paper shop is forty nine years old,the grocery shop is thirty years old and the other grocery shop is fifty six years old. Three of the shops are general stores. We interviewed eight customers,they all thought the shops were useful.Five of the customers use the shops at least twice a week.
